data.name: The Metronomicon - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Catch the fever and deliver the beatdown with the soundtrack of the base game of The Metronomicon!

The Soundtrack! Includes the following artists and tracks:

Original Tracks for:

  • Shiny Toy Guns - Live it Up
  • Efe Tozan - Beyoglu Nights
  • Efe Tozan - 111
  • Viking Guitar - Dropship
------------------------------------------------

Licensed Tracks for Include:

  • J-Punch - Temple (Original 2004 Version)
  • Mega Ran - Miss Communication
  • J-Punch - Almost Over (feat. Dave Moonshine)
  • Dj CUTMAN - Samurai (feat. Popcorn Kid)
  • and many, many more!

data.short_description: You got your glowsticks in my chainmail! You got your fireballs in my dubstep! But with SOUND!

fullgame.name: The Metronomicon: Slay The Dance Floor

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Graphics: 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Storage: 341 MB available space
  • Sound Card: One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Intel-based Mac running Mac OS X 10.7.3 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Graphics: 1GB, OpenGL 1.5+
  • Sound Card: One that allows sound to come out of a sound maker
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: You can use the following controllers for this game; M/K, Xbox 360 Controller, Xbox One Controller, PS3/PS4 controllers, PS3/4 Rock Band Guitars, XB Rock Band Guitars, our Custom "The Metronomicon" Dance Pad, plus the majority of USB Dance Pads (sadly we haven't tested them all so there is no guarantee on these)
